Package edu.bu.pas.othello.game

Class Board

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.othello.game.LogicalBoard
edu.bu.pas.othello.game.Board
public class Board extends LogicalBoard
A class that represents the 8x8 board that Othello is played on. This class contains a 2d array of PlayerType instances that represent who placed a tile on that cell on the board.
See Also:

  • Coordinate

    • getNumRows

      public final int getNumRows()
      A getter method to get the number of rows (y coordinate) this board has. This will return the value 8.

    • getCell

      public PlayerType getCell(int rIdx, int cIdx)
      A getter method to get the PlayerType at a specific location on the board. This will return null if no player has placed a tile at this location.
      Specified by:
      getCell in class LogicalBoard
      Returns:
      The @{link PlayerType} at the specified location. May be null.

    • getCell

      public PlayerType getCell(Coordinate c)
      A getter method to get the PlayerType at a specific Coordinate on the board. This will return null if no player has placed a tile at this location.
      Specified by:
      getCell in class LogicalBoard
      Returns:
      The @{link PlayerType} at the specified Coordinate. May be null.

    • setCell

      public void setCell(int rIdx, int cIdx, PlayerType t)
      A method to set the value at a specified location in the 2d array of PlayerType instances..
      Parameters:
      rIdx - The row (y coordinate) of the location to set.
      cIdx - The column (x coordinate) of the location to set.
      t - The PlayerType value to set that location to.

    • setCell

      public void setCell(Coordinate c, PlayerType t)
      A method to set the value at a specified location in the 2d array of PlayerType instances..
      Parameters:
      c - The Coordinate location to set.
      t - The PlayerType value to set that location to.

    • isInBounds

      public final boolean isInBounds(Coordinate c)
      A method to calculate whether or not a specified Coordinate location is a valid coordinate on the map. This will return true iff the x and y coordinates are both between [0, 8).
      Specified by:
      isInBounds in class LogicalBoard
      Parameters:
      c - The Coordinate to test.
      Returns:
      true iff both the Coordinate's x and y values are between [0, 8).

    • wouldSandwichOppositePlayerInDirection

      public final boolean wouldSandwichOppositePlayerInDirection(PlayerType currentPlayerType, Coordinate startCoord, Direction direction)
      A method to calculate whether or not if a specified PlayerType places a tile at a specific Coordinate would result in sandwiching (e.g. "outflanking") a contiguous chain of opponent pieces in the specified Direction or not.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerType - The PlayerType of the player considering placing the tile.
      startCoord - The hypothetical Coordinate of the placed tile.
      direction - The Direction to check for a sandwiching of opponent pieces.
      Returns:
      true if a contiguous chain of opponent pieces would be sandwiched by placing a tile at the specified coordinate in the specified direction by the specified player. false otherwise.

    • flipSandwichedPieces

      public final void flipSandwichedPieces(PlayerType currentPlayerType, Coordinate startCoord, Direction direction)
      A method to flip the contiguous chain of opponent pieces that were sandwiched by the specified player placing a tile at the specified location in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerType - The PlayerType of the player who placed the tile.
      startCoord - The Coordinate of the placed tile.
      direction - The Direction of the sandwiching to flip.

    • placeTileAndFlipSandwichedPieces

      public final void placeTileAndFlipSandwichedPieces(PlayerType currentPlayerType, Coordinate startCoord)
      A method to place a tile at the specified location by the specified player and flip all sandwiches that occur as a result.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerType - The PlayerType of the player placing the tile.
      startCoord - The Coordinate of the placed tile.
